title: Lin-Manuel Miranda And Stephen Perform "Button!" | Colbert Classic
description:
The next great American musical is here about one of the lesser-known founding fathers, and its name is "Button!" Enjoy this blast from the past as Stephen talks to Lin-Manuel Miranda about "Hamilton," New York and his influences, and stick around for a musical performance you won't want to miss this Independence Day.
